name: giga-drain
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.
